channel.title: Cthulhu Deep Green Scenario
channel.description:
> The mangled body of an Italian exchange student in old fashioned automobilist clothes is recovered from a fatal car crash. The driver’s body and his car show disturbing alterations.
Grab the free Cthulhu Deep Green scenario set in London during the second summer of love here: https://wurstproduktion.itch.io/veitstanz

item.title: Cthulhu Deep Green Scenario
item.dc:creator: @MrGarland
item.description:
@MrGarland wrote:

Ooo. I’ll be looking into this one. Cthulhu Deep Green has been good to me to date.

Read full topic
